column1: 27642,Dark X-Men: The Beginning (2009) #2,2,57217,28,"UTOPIA TIE-IN Who are the Dark X-Men and how did they come to be?  FIND OUT HERE!   Each issue has 3 11-page stories, each dedicated to one of the Dark X-Men and how they came to be part of the team.  This first two issues focus on Emma Frost, Mimic, Cloak & Dagger, Daken, Weapon X and Dark Beast!  Rated A ...$3.99",
